programme.title: The Grand Hotel - Episode 9
programme.desc: The five friends help out at The Grand Hotel that Andrea's family just bought during what was supposed to be a quiet weekend until a hotel critic arrives unexpectedly. The girls are ready to do everything to make a great impression - but things don't quite go according to plan. Andrea, Stephanie, Olivia, Emma and Mia have come for breakfast at the fanciest hotel in town, now owned by Andrea's family. When Andrea's aunt has to leave town, the girls volunteer to run the hotel for the weekend with the help of quirky Grandma Jean. This is the perfect job for Stephanie's expert managerial skills but then the hotel suddenly fills to capacity with guests, including a hotel critic that can make or break the hotel's reputation! Now the girls find themselves in over their heads juggling reception, childcare, food prep and waitressing, a dog-walking service and a testy chef who quits on them in the middle of dinner. Unfortunately, much of this is their own fault. Can the girls save the Grand Hotel from themselves?

programme.title: All Of Nothing
programme.desc: The ninja and Sensei Wu try to infiltrate the Serpentines' inner sanctum and walk right into a trap, and when Lloyd's rescue mission fails, there is only one person who can help them, namely the evil Lord Garmadon - but can they trust him?

programme.title: The Might And The Magic - Episode 110
programme.desc: Aaron races across the kingdom to gather the NEXO-Knights as Jestro and his Destructive Monsters attack the King's Castle. The Knights must get back to the capitol in time, or Jestro will rule the kingdom! Jestro, while still attacking the King's Castle, has second thoughts until the Book of Monsters orders the mad jester to feed him another magic book he's found (and has been saving.) It's the powerful "Book of Revenge!" Now, combining the powers of Revenge and Destruction, Jestro and his monsters will get their vengeance on King Halbert and the Kingdom of Knighton. Jestro and his monsters lay siege...will they destroy the castle?! Meanwhile, Aaron races across the Kingdom gathering the NEXO-Knights one at a time. As each Knight rejoins the group, they become a more and more powerful team. They even get Robin to join them as the Black Knight in his repaired power suit. Our Knights arrive, finally regrouped, fight off Jestro, save the castle and the King. It's a glorious victory! The King is so pleased after seeing how the brave NEXO-Knights saved his kingdom, he allows Macy to join them as an official NEXO-Knight.

programme.title: The Rise Of The Great Devourer
programme.desc: The ninja haste to the lost city of Ouroboros to try to stop Pythor from awaking The Great Devourer but it is a race against time.

programme.title: Back To School - Episode 201
programme.desc: When the NEXO-Knights are sloppy in a fight with Jestro, Merlok 2.0 sends them back to the Knights' Academy. Not only for a brush-up but to find out what Jestro is after in its hallowed halls. As they Knights battle Jestro - in a somewhat haphazard and lazy way - they discuss the fact that Jestro never wins and that they're always getting over on him. Despite defeating the jerky Jester and his evil Book, Merlok 2.0 discovers that something about the attack on the village is tied to the Knights' Academy. It looks like that's where they'll strike next. It wouldn't hurt for the Knights to go "back to school" to watch for Jestro and for some refresher training. Merlok is sure Jestro wants something at the Academy, but he doesn't know what it is. The Knights are very much "fish out of water" at the academy, even with the "cool kids" - Robin and Ava - showing them around. The next generation of Knights is being taught to integrate the NEXO-Magic of Merlok into their fighting techniques and these kids are good (so good, they initially kick the lazy, know-it-all Knight's butts!) Their old principal, the ever-ornery Headmaster Brickland, sets them straight: they're all still slackers, and they better get their acts together (especially Lance!) The Knights take shifts as "library helpers" much to the delight of the old squirebot librarian, MARGE. They're convinced Jestro is after a book...isn't he always after a book? When Jestro attacks, the Knights help organize the students and there's a big fight in the Academy Library versus Jestro and his Monsters. They drive Jestro off without letting him steal any books! Victory! But as Jestro leaves, we see him holding what the Book of Monsters really wanted: a snow globe with a castle in it that was sitting on the librarian's desk. In the Lava Lands, Jestro throws the snow globe into a volcano and it frees the massive Castle of Monstrux from its snowy magic prison

programme.title: Getting The Message - Episode 11
programme.desc: As the Friends enjoy Heartlake Amusement Park, Emma types a text to Mia, but sends it to Matthew by mistake a text that could be mega-embarrassing for Emma! As her BFF's, the Friends race to find Matthew's phone and erase the text before he reads it. But first, they must brave space rides, dunking booths and worse: the boys locker room! What's more frightening than a roller coaster? More twisted than a funhouse mirror? A text gone wrong! The Friends' fun day at Heartlake Amusement Park turns into a frantic race against time when Emma discovers that her innocent text to Mia was sent to Matthew by mistake -- a text that accidentally sounds like a pledge of Emma's undying love for Matthew! Mega-embarrassing! As Emma's BFF's, the Friends must scramble to retrieve Matthew's phone and erase the text before he reads it. But first, they need to brave space rides, dunking booths, an angry brute and worse - the boys locker room!

programme.title: Day Of The Great Devourer
programme.desc: Disaster threatens as the ninja must fight to defeat the all consuming Great Devourer in a desperate attempt to save Ninjago.

programme.title: Greed Is Good? - Episode 202
programme.desc: When Jestro uses the Book of Greed to rob Auremville of its riches, he also gets Lance's parents as prisoners and these demanding rich folks are too much for even monsters to handle. Jestro's not sure what to do with his new castle in the Lava Lands. "Every castle needs a big chamber filled with treasure" says the Book of Monsters so they've got to go out looting! The BOM convinces Jestro to call forth GENERAL MAGMAR, and Jestro appoints him as "general manager" of "castle operations," much to Magmar's dismay. Meanwhile, Jestro and the BOM find the BOOK OF GREED. This will allow them to make greedy, rapacious monsters that will bring them all the treasure they want to fill their castle! They'll head to the richest town in the realm - AUREMVILLE! Meanwhile, in Auremville, the NEXO-Knights arrive for a huge "Gold is Good" ball at Lance's house. When the Monsters finally arrive in Auremville, a battle breaks out and the greedy monsters make off with everything...including Lance's parents, Goldie and Cuthbert Richmond who are clad in the finest golden garments and so look valuable! Lance will now be forced to live...poor. The Knights have to get his parents back. Meanwhile, his parents - Cuthbert and Goldie Richmond -think their imprisonment in Jestro's gold-filled castle is a "spa holiday" with the worst service. They order Magmar and the monsters around like servants and drive them all crazy. The Knights pile into the Fortrex and head for the Lava Lands, formulating a plan along the way to free Lance's parents. In a village half-way to Jestro's Castle, the Knights run into...Jestro and his monsters headed the other way with Lance's parents and all the gold they've stolen. There's a big fight, until they realize they might have the same goal and decide to deal. The BOM wants to give them back all the gold and Lance's parents. Lance says "No deal." "We'll take the gold, you can keep my parents." It's a weird and comical stand-off. Finally, Clay convinces Lance he has to take his parents back even if they don't always get along (and, it's the only way to get the gold back.)

programme.title: Darkness Shall Rise
programme.desc: Just as the rebuilding effort in Ninjago begins, the four ninjas come to realize that evil has started to resurface with Lord Garmadon forging the ninjas' lost Golden Weapons into a Mega-Weapon with unspeakable powers. With the Devourer destroyed, Ninjago is saved and the rebuilding effort begins. Without their Golden Weapons, the Ninja are stripped of their elemental powers. And with their flying ship 'The Destiny's Bounty' destroyed, the Ninja are forced to find a new home in the city. Meanwhile, Lord Garmadon resurfaces and gains control of the Serpentine as well as transforms the Bounty's wreckage to become 'The Black Bounty'. The Ninja will battle Scales and discover evil has begun to resurface in Ninjago, while Lord Garmadon will successfully forge the Golden Weapons into a Mega-Weapon with unspeakable powers.

programme.title: The Book Of Obsession - Episode 203
programme.desc: The Knights are tasked with protecting the King's valuable Ned Knights comic book during the Bookingheim Knight-a-Con. But with all the costumed kids there, will they recognize the real Jestro and Book of Monsters coming to get them? King Halbert instructs the Knights that they must take his valuable Ned Knights comic book to the "Knight-a-Kon" in Bookingham. It will be the first be first prize at the Knight-a-Kon. But the Book of Monsters wants the book, too. Having devoured Ned Knightly comic books in it's down time it has become fanatically obsessed with the storyline. General Magmar suggests they simply attack the place and take what they want, but Jestro tells them they can't: everyone will be in costume and they'll be thousands of comics there. This calls for a clever "infiltration" mission (which will also allow Jestro to see the Kon, which he's always wanted to do.) So Jestro goes into the Kon with the BOM and some monsters. And it's easy because everyone is in costume Jestro, the BOM and their monsters fit right in at the convention and Clay and crew have their work cut out for them trying to separate fiend from fan. Macy keeps going on-and-on about the story in the King's comic book as the Knights keep a watchful eye on it. Robin even shows up in the "Minitrex" - a small version of the Fortrex he built just for the Knight-a-Kon. He's convinced he can win the costume competition that is the big closing event for the Kon. At the end of the Kon there's a big awards ceremony for "Best Costume." The prize: "Ned Knightly, Knight of Knighton, Issue #1." The BOM must get it and scheme to get closer to it during the costume contest. He's just...about...to get the book when...the impatient Magmar attacks! Everyone thinks it's part of the big show! "Ned Knightly, Knight of Knighton, Issue #1" is tossed from person-to-person-to-person in the melee. The Knights must do something, but they're too far away from the Fortrex to download any NEXO-Power. Robin pulls up in his Minitrex they can use it to get NEXO-Power! Robin wins the best costume for his Minitrex and wins the Ned Knightly Comic which he then gives to Macy...she deserves to read it.

programme.title: The Drooling Detective - Episode 13
programme.desc: When ruthless dognappers steal Mia's dog Toffee from the Heartlake City Dog Talent Show, it's up to the Friends to play detective and track down the culprits, with the help of an unlikely hero: Stephanie's borrowed sad-sack bloodhound, Benchley. Andrea and her singing dog act, the Howlers, are a sure bet to win the Heartlake City Dog Talent Show - in spite of stiff competition from Tanya's dancing poodle, Olivia's Robo-Dog, and even Stephanie's sad-sack borrowed bloodhound, Benchley. But when an unscrupulous mother-and-son dog-napping team steals the Howlers' best singer, Mia's dog Toffee, it's up to the Friends to rescue him and catch the baddies with the help of the Hero Of The Day - Benchley!

programme.title: Pirates Vs. Ninja
programme.desc: When Garmadon by accident brings to life the original owners of the Black Bounty - the ruthless Captain Soto and his Pirates - it is up to our ninjas to stop them from plundering Ninjago City. Sharing a tiny, one-bedroom apartment in the city, the Ninja take Lloyd to Grand Sensei Darreth's Mojo Dojo to begin training. There, they discover Lloyd has all four of their natural elemental abilities. Meanwhile, Lord Garmadon discovers his Mega-Weapon can't destroy, only create what the user wishes. By accident, Garmadon brings to life the original owners of the Black Bounty: Captain Soto and his Pirates, and they mutiny the ship. Answering the age-old question of who would win a fight between pirates and ninja, it's up to our ninja to stop Captain Soto and his men from plundering Ninjago City. In the end, Ninjago City is saved, the Pirates are arrested and Lord Garmadon escapes once again with their Black Bounty.

programme.title: The King's Tournament - Episode 204
programme.desc: Rival to the King, Jorah Tightwad thinks his knights - the Tighty Knighties - are easily better than the NEXO-Knights, so he challenges King Halbert to prove who's better during the King's Birthday Tournament. It's the King's birthday! To celebrate, the Queen and Macy always throw him a great, big birthday party consisting of a feast on birthday eve and a tournament the next day. At the birthday banquet is JORAH TIGHTWAD (last seen in episode 104.) He's goading the King (and on his birthday, even) and going on and on about how his knights are better than the NEXO-Knights. The King protests, but Jorah asks "How many magical books have your knights recovered? None, zilch, zero." But he produces the BOOK OF ENVY, which his superior knights captured from Jestro. The next day, the NEXO-Knights square off against Tightwad's four knights: JOUSTING BEEBER, BRICKNEY SPEARS, SHIA LABLADE and THE BLOK. We see that all these knights are envious of the NEXO-Knights: their weapons, their fame, their hair, etc. Macy is also disappointed to find out she CAN'T fight in the tournament - she's agreed to be in "princess mode" for her father's birthday. During the tournament, we see that Tightwad's knights are amazing in fighting contests. They all pair-off with knights who have their same weapons skills. Tightwad makes fun of the NEXO-Knights as his knights do well. Jestro and the Book of Monsters discover that Tightwad has the Book of Envy and he and his monsters attack the tournament. Then we learn that Tightwad's knights might be good tournament fighters, but they can't handle real fights and the NEXO-Knights must save them! Macy is finally able to join in the fight when she sees Magmar show up on the flank. The NEXO-Knights successfully defend the king, but Jestro gets away with the Book of Envy. Tightwad must admit his knights never won the book from Jestro he got the book when Merlok blasted books of magic across the realm. Tightwad's knights all admit that they really admire the NEXO-Knights.

programme.title: Rabbitouille - Episode 14
programme.desc: It's Stephanie vs. Tanya on a TV Bake-Off to end all bake-offs! Stephanie concocts a fabulous cake, and Sneaky Tanya steals the recipe -- but neither knows that pet bunny Daisy has added a secret key ingredient. Will Stephanie's frantic efforts to win at all costs end her friendship with her BFF's? It's Stephanie vs. Tanya on a TV Bake-Off to end all bake-offs! After the duo's rivalry brings Aunt Sophie's Adopt-A-Pet Fair to a disastrous end, a contrite Stephanie wants to make amends with the prize money from a TV Bake-Off show. At home, Stephanie practices baking a delicious cake, and Tanya steals the recipe. But neither girl knows that Stephanie's pet bunny has inadvertently added a secret ingredient, ensuring that no one can repeat the recipe. A frustrated Stephanie freaks out, nearly ending her friendship with the girls - until they discover the bunny's secret and race to help Stephanie win.

programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: When our heroes are invited back to Darkly's Boarding School, they discover it's a trap set up by Lord Garmadon and his evil replica ninjas created by Garmadon's new Mega-Weapo. Realizing how to correctly wield the Mega-Weapon, Lord Garmadon creates evil replicas of the Ninja to face off with our heroes. Meanwhile, Lloyd and the Ninja are invited back the Darkly's Boarding School, only to discover it's a trap and now the bad kids have seized control of the school. With the Ninja trapped in the school with the faculty, things spiral out of control as the Evil Replica Ninja arrive. As an awesome battle takes place in the school halls, the Ninja manage to outsmart their evil versions, and warn Lord Garmadon they're ready for whatever else he throws at them.

programme.title: Monster Chef - Episode 205
programme.desc: Axl and Chef Éclair must enter a cooking contest to try to keep Jestro from getting the hottest chili recipe in the realm. Knighton celebrity chef GOBBLETON RAMBLEY announces that he's developed the hottest chili recipe ever created. Now, he intends to give the recipe to the winner of his "Hottest Chili Cook-Off Competition" cooking show on Knighton TV. He'll turn over his famous Chili Cookbook with the hottest chili recipe on the last page. It's so unique it can't be recreated without it. Jestro and the Book of Monsters think they MUST have that recipe. "Hot chili makes hot monsters!" Merlok knows that this recipe, in the wrong hands - meaning Jestro's - could be dangerous. But when the Knights appeal to the egomaniacal chef, he says the only way to get the recipe is to win it from him. So Axl and Chef Éclair decide to enter. The team that creates the hottest chili will win Rambley's cookbook. Chef Éclair is unsure that Axl has the skills to help them win the competition, but, as we see through funny cooking show bits, Axl is quite good and they become a pretty good team. (We will also learn that years ago, Rambley stole one of Éclair's best recipes and they don't like each other.) While watching the multi-part competition, Aaron and Lance have a contest of their own: who can eat the hottest chili. Axl and Éclair actually win the competition, coming up with a raging hot chili recipe. Before they can claim their prize, Jestro and his monsters attack with Magmar leading the way on his siege tower. They must get that cookbook! During the battle, Rambley's cookbook is accidentally melted. After the battle, Rambley announces his new quest: to make the sweetest ice cream ever! While Axl and Éclair cook happily in the kitchen of the Fortrex, back in the Redoubt of Ruination, Jestro and Lavaria are attempting to recreate Rambley's chili recipe. They keep spooning various recipes of chili into the Book of Monsters. "Nope, not hot enough...waaaay too much garlic....you call that hot?!" (BELCH!)

programme.title: Change Of Address - Episode 15
programme.desc: When Stephanie's mom leaves her in charge of their house for a few days, it's finally Stephanie's chance to prove she can handle responsibility alone. Naturally, everything that can go wrong does go wrong - especially when the entire house disappears! When Stephanie's mom leaves her in charge of their house for a few days, it's finally Stephanie's chance to prove she can handle responsibility alone. But after fending off Andrea's party plans, a Home Alone-style break-in (by the hapless Snivel, trying to retrieve incriminating evidence of the Mayor's latest scheme), and finally the entire house disappearing ("Uh, think Stephanie's Mom will notice?"), Stephanie comes to appreciate that responsibility is a lot harder than it looks.

programme.title: Ninjaball Run
programme.desc: When the ninja learn that Darreth's Mojo Dojo is to be destroyed and Darreth doesn't have the money to save it, our heroes enter the annual NinjaBall Run to win its cash prize in order to save the dojo. As Lloyd continues to train and unlock his hidden powers, the Ninja learn land developers are going to destroy Darreth's Mojo Dojo unless Darreth can find the money to save it. The Ninja decide to enter their Ninja Tank into the annual NinjaBall Run cross-country rally to try to win its cash prize. Revisiting past characters who also enter the race, the high-speed derby will only grow more dangerous as Garmadon enters his Black Bounty, realizing this is the perfect chance to use his Mega-Weapon and rid the ninja. In the end, the Ninja will discover a few secrets within their Ninja Tank, allowing them to beat Garmadon's Bounty by a millisecond and saving Darreth's Dojo with their well-deserved cash prize. And as a final surprise, the Ninja steal back the Destiny's Bounty and make it their own once again.

programme.title: Knight Out - Episode 206
programme.desc: When the other NEXO-Knights decide they need a vacation from Clay, they send him on a holiday not knowing that he's going to a resort that houses an evil book or that Jestro will be heading there, too. Clay needs a vacation. Or, actually, the knights need a vacation from Clay! Clay is so super-focused that sometimes they just can't take it: training, training, maintenance, the Knights' Code tests then...more training. Even Merlok 2.0 is exhausted and he has no physical form! So, the Knights send Clay off on a holiday against his will (arranged by Lance because if there's one thing he can do it's plan a vacation.) But unbeknownst to the other Knights, Jestro and the Book of Monsters are tracking an evil book. A book that they suspect is located near the resort "Exalted Towers" renowned for its exquisite service, where Clay is staying. It's the BOOK OF CRUELTY and Clay notices that it's affecting the "high class" resort where Lance has booked him: the service is terrible, the staff is nasty, and everyone seems to take joy in being cruel to him (and to each other.) Meanwhile, the other Knights are having a terrible time because they realize that Clay takes charge of the basic maintenance of almost everything in the Fortrex. Stuff starts breaking down, chores are not getting done and everyone is getting on each other's nerves. Clay senses things are "off" at the resort, and discovers the book they've been using as the guest register is really the Book of Cruelty. As Clay scoops it up, he looks outside to see...Jestro and his monsters arrive on the Evilmobile. Clay battles as best he can on his own by setting traps and being cunning but he's finally caught. Just when it looks like this will be the cruelest vacation ever the other Knights arrive on their vehicles! They spring into action, free Clay, and battle and defeat Jestro and the monsters - though Jestro escapes. The Knights make Clay promise to never go on vacation again.

programme.title: Dive In - Episode 16
programme.desc: Working summer jobs at the new Heartlake City Pool, Restaurant and Sports Center is fun and games for the Friends - until singing mermaid Andrea gets her very first teenage crush. The Friends each try to help, with disastrous results. Working summer jobs at the new Heartlake City Pool, Restaurant and Sports Center is fun and games for the Friends - until singing mermaid Andrea gets her very first teenage crush. He's Tad, the new lifeguard, and just the sight of him reduces the normally fearless Andrea to a babbling wimp. The Friends all try to help her out, with less-than stellar results, each attempt resulting in increasing mayhem for Tad until he's terrified of Andrea. Then Andrea discovers that she's been mooning over the wrong boy all along!

programme.title: Child's Play
programme.desc: When the Ninja interrupt Lord Garmadon from using his Mega-Weapon to 'turn back the clock' and bring to life the fossils of a monster, the Ninja are accidentally hit and turned into kids and are now forced to enlist Lloyd's help to battle the awakened monster. Tired of intense training, Lloyd yearns to play and enjoy his youth. The Ninja remind Lloyd that along with great power, comes great responsibility. When the Ninja interrupt Lord Garmadon from using his Mega-Weapon to 'turn back the clock' and bring to life the fossils of a monster, the Ninja are accidentally hit and soon discover they've been turned into kids! Seeking Lloyd's help and relying on childhood antics, the five ninja kids must destroy the reawakened monster that's hunting them in the city. In the end, Lloyd makes the difficult decision and sacrifices his youth in order to save them from the beast, turning forward the clock and turning Lloyd into a young man. Sensei Wu fears now that since Lloyd is young man, the final battle of good versus evil approaches sooner than he had ever expected.

programme.title: Saturday Knight Fever - Episode 207
programme.desc: The Book of Monsters catching a cold means trouble for the NEXO-Knights when he can create an entirely new kind of "snotty" monster. King and Queen Halbert have journeyed to the town of Cleanington to open the brand new Scrubbery Barn at the invitation of Roger the Scrubber (seen in 104.) Meanwhile, the Book of Monsters drags Jestro to Snottingham - one of the coldest places in Knighton where everyone coughs, has a runny nose and is generally under-the-weather. The BOM demands that Jestro feed him a "snotheiser" ball which will probably make him sick. The BOM explains that if he is sick, he may just produce a whole new breed of magical monsters ... some that the knights would NEVER expect. The BOM gets sick and starts coughing up phlegm globlins and bloblins. The Knights arrive, alerted to what they think is an attack on the town by Snottingham's mayor, Hack Coughmeier. The sickened, sneezy, snotty monsters infect the knights and, more importantly, the knights' NEXO-Shields. Now their NEXO-Powers are infected. As they try to download something to fight the monsters, they realize the powers they get are off strange, infected versions of their powers. The knights drive Jestro and his snot monsters off and they turn in for the night. And, overnight, they all get sick. Meanwhile, the BOM order a nice, hot lava bath...he'll feel fine by morning. But the knights wake-up with colds and they feel terrible. Ava and Merlok 2.0 thinks it will pass in a day or two...it's just a typical Snottingham cold. Each knight gets sick in their own funny way and their illnesses play right into Jestro and the BOM's hands: they're headed to Cleanington to kidnap the king! The citizens of the ultra-clean city hate the sight of monsters, but then feel caught in between when the sick, sneezy, snotty knights arrive on their Fortrex. The fight goes terribly for the knights. They try to download the Nexo-power "Glorious Griffon" but instead get just feathers. So they improvise and tickle the monsters! Ava finally comes up with a way to use some anti-virus tools on their NEXO-Shields and just as Jestro is about to take the king and queen away, the NEXO-Knights get their normal powers back! They defeat Jestro and save the king and queen.

programme.title: I Told You So - Episode 17
programme.desc: Confined to a wheelchair after a failed Halloween attempt to prove herself a reporter, What's At Heart photographer Emma sees strange goings-on through her hospital window. She's convinced the neighbors are jewel thieves, but no one believes her - till the bad guys come after her! To show her Friends on the What's At Heart school paper that she's more than just a photographer, Emma investigates a scary old house on Halloween eve -- only to take a tumble and land in the hospital. There, confined to a wheelchair, she observes mysterious goings-on through her window which convince her that the neighbors are jewel thieves. Her friends, though dubious, agree to check it out. But after nearly getting caught by the neighbors, they come up empty and decide it's all just Emma's imagination. Meanwhile, up in Maternity, Sophie's having a baby! The girls run out, leaving Emma alone. And that's when the bad guys decide to pay Emma a visit...

programme.title: Super Detention

programme.title: Bubu and the Little Owls

programme.title: Craft And Cooking Corner
programme.desc: It's time to get arty and cook, cut and craft with your friends from Badanamu Arts & Crafts, Kooki's Crafty Show, Wonderballs, How To Draw Om Nom and Ninja Pop.

programme.title: Raggs
programme.desc: Raggs stars five members of a canine band, Raggs, Trilby, Pido, B. Max and Razzles, and their wise-cracking pet cat, Dumpster, who learn life lessons together in their own cool clubhouse. Each episode follows the characters through engaging , emotional and humorous stories that rock the house and explore issues faced by real kids. Music is an integral part of this fast-paced show, providing a hook to engage and reinforce the educational and pro-social lessons.

programme.title: Agi Bagi

programme.title: Sophie la Girafe

programme.title: Baby Riki

programme.title: Tommy the little dragon
programme.desc: Tommy is a soft toy who lives with an ordinary panda family. Panda parents have no idea about him, while their cubs cannot live a day without Tommy! With the help of his magic soap bubbles, Tommy teleports kids to wonderful universes full of adventures, to help them discover a vast and captivating world, fight their fears and inhibitions, and learn important family values.

programme.title: Raggs

programme.title: 3 Rabbits

programme.title: Get Up & Dance!

programme.title: Toys and Fun Sisters

programme.title: Willa's Wild Life: An Alligator Ate My Homework / Hammering Away
programme.desc: When Willas school project disappears Gus is wrongfully accused of eating the homework. / Willa and the gang build a giraffe-house for Jenny.

programme.title: Dog City: The New Litter
programme.desc: Ace Hart adventures in Jurassic Bark, while Eliot helps Artie grapple with the trials of creativity.

programme.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou: The Brave Guy / Starring Ms. Strich
programme.desc: Munroe is scared by a spooky story / Ms. Strich gets a part in a local play.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger: Indian Peacock/Clouded Leopard
programme.desc: Leo, Katie and Hero get to know a feathery new friend an Indian peacock! They bring the peacock to the rainforest to look for peahens. A trip to the rainforest becomes necessary when a clouded leopar

programme.title: Ebb and Flo: Ebb and the Greedy Gulls / Ebb's Birthday
programme.desc: Ebb and Bird lose their breakfast to a greedy gull. Unaware, Flo takes them for a beach picnic and Ebb has to guard the sandwiches from the gulls. Ebb gets the blame for eating the sandwiches / Ebb's squeaky ball has lost its squeak. And the next day is Ebb's birthday . Flo has organised a party for Ebb and after, Flo and Bird give Ebb a birthday gift. It's a brand new squeaky ball! Things Couldn't Be Better!

programme.title: Rastamouse: Da Marathon Mystery
programme.desc: Take away pizza, a suspicious broken leg and a marathon mystery that has even Rastamouse puzzled.

programme.title: Kids Diana Show: Roma's Diana Daycare! / Diana and Roma's Magical, Mystical Blocks!
programme.desc: Roma is left in charge of Diana for the day and finds out she can be quite a handful!

programme.title: Care Bears: The Race Is On
programme.desc: The Care Bears are cruisin' down the raceway lookin' good with rainbow power under their hood.

programme.title: Jar Dwellers SOS: Crunch in a Lather
programme.desc: Crunch is frightened by his own wall shadow after he lathers wildly from swallowing Silly Sausages soaps.

programme.title: Jar Dwellers SOS: Home Alone
programme.desc: Barka takes charge when Sophie and David leave for their school holidays. Ooble and Crunch run riot and lead Van Riceberger dangerously close to the cave.

programme.title: Everything's Rosie: Super Will
programme.desc: WILL becomes a super hero for the day!

programme.title: Everything's Rosie: When Did You Last See Your Nest?
programme.desc: BLUEBIRD is upset when her new nest goes missing.

programme.title: Where's Chicky?
programme.desc: Chicky tries to stands up while the ground keeps looping on and on.

programme.title: Robot Trains: The Secret of Alpha Train
programme.desc: Kay listens to Stella's story about the primordial train called the Alpha Train.

programme.title: The Wubbulous World of Dr. Seuss: The Song of the Zubble-Wump
programme.desc: The priceless Zubble-Wump egg has been in Megan Mullally's family for as long as anyone can remember - until it's stolen!

programme.title: Planet Cosmo: Fluffy Clouds
programme.desc: When Mum misses the clouds, Cosmo, Dad, and Sol go to Jupiter to make a surprise for her.

programme.title: PAW Patrol: Pup Tales
programme.desc: Something's happening beneath Adventure Bay that's causing everything to shake and break! Ruder and the Pups need to find out what's causing the shaking and put the town back together again!

programme.title: Supa Strikas: Dancing Rasta On a Ice
programme.desc: Wearing the captain's armband is a great honour for Dancing Rasta, but after a fall in the Himalayas, he is concerned about his leadership abilities.

programme.title: Supa Strikas: Cool Joe Looses His Groove
programme.desc: Funky Cool Joe gets into the rhythm before every game with his favourite song.

programme.title: Transformers Rescue Bots: Odd Bot Out
programme.desc: Blades feels left out when Bumblebee, on a mission to Griffin Rock, partners up with Dani.

programme.title: Pins and Nettie: Hedgie and Kitty / Hedgie Pressie
programme.desc: The Narrator brought her new kitten with her today. She's super cute and really wants to play with Pins and Nettie. But the hedgehogs aren't so sure and are going to need some help warming up to her. / While exploring, Pins comes across a shiny stone that he thinks would be perfect for Nettie's shiny things collection. But when Pins goes to give Nettie her present, Pins shies away. What if Nettie doesn't like it after all?!

programme.title: Pins and Nettie: Hedgie Hokey Pokey / Hedgie Thunder
programme.desc: Pins and Nettie have been invited to their friend's dance party! But the hedgies completely freak out at the prospect of doing the hokey-pokey. / It's thundering out and Pins and Nettie do not like it one bit. The thunder especially makes them really anxious. But once they think of the thunder not as scary, the hedgies realize that thunderstorms can actually be lots of fun!

programme.title: T-Rex Ranch: Giant Dinosaurs & LB Finds a Secret Door! Kids Dinosaur Adventure with T-Rex & Pretend Play Toys
programme.desc: Park Ranger LB and Park Ranger Aaron find a secret door and go on quest to find LB's Dinosaur toy. They discover glowing colorful mystery Dinosaurs and a giant T-Rex!

programme.title: T-Rex Ranch: Dinosaurs & Tyson at Jurassic Quest

programme.title: Jane White is Sick and Twisted
programme.desc: Jane White (Kim Little) is a disturbed young woman living in her own bizarre TV fantasy land. For Jane, life itself is a television program, and she dreams of becoming a star on the small screen. Convincing herself that Gerry King (David L. Lander), a popular talk show host, is her birth father, she sets out on an adventurous road trip -- aided by her equally looney boyfriend, Dick (Wil Wheaton) -- to confront her "father" on the air, and, just maybe, make a splash on reality television.

programme.title: Mega Shark vs Giant Octopus
programme.desc: Strange things are afoot in the depths of the sea. First a passenger plane vanishes over the Pacific Ocean. Then an oil platform is obliterated. Marine biologist Emma MacNeil (Deborah Gibson) is dispatched to investigate the phenomena, and, with the help of Japanese scientist Seiji Shimada (Vic Chao), she makes a discovery that will rock the world: An enormous prehistoric shark and a giant octopus have been awakened from their icy slumbers -- and they're hungry.

programme.title: Merlin and the War of the Dragons
programme.desc: Before growing into the legendary adviser to the Pendragons, a youthful Merlin spends his days studying with the Mage (Jürgen Prochnow), a master sorcerer, and honing his magical skills. When a fellow apprentice sorcerer, Hengest (Iago McGuire), grows jealous of Merlin's rapid progress, he rebels against their mutual mentor and betrays King Vortigen (Hefin Wyn) to Saxon invaders. As Hengest conjures an army of dragons, Merlin prepares to test his developing abilities in battle.

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel
programme.desc: In this modern retelling of the classic horror tale, teen siblings are enslaved by a psychotic recluse within her gruesome house of horrors in the woods.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E4 | Aliens in New England
programme.desc: We explore the stories of a British priest who dressed as a mermaid, a father and son who created over 3,000 glass flowers, and a small town in New England that was besieged by UFOs.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E5 | Oddities in Pennsylvania
programme.desc: We explore the stories of a museum of medical oddities, three friends whose fates are all tied to the Battle of Gettysburg, as well as the town of Punxsutawney and their celebrated groundhog.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E6 | The Thief Taker
programme.desc: Explore the stories of a man who painstakingly recreates miniature historic figures, and an English gentleman who would find stolen items for a small fee but turned out to be the thief.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E7 | The Bones of 'Mad' Anthony Wayne
programme.desc: We explore the stories of a Revolutionary War general who received an unusual burial, the sprawling history of ice cream, and a town in Southern California that is the center of the world.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E8 | The Johnstown Flood
programme.desc: We explore the stories of one of the deadliest disasters in American history, as well as an elephant-shaped building and its interesting history on a seaside town.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E9 | The Liberty Bell
programme.desc: We explore the stories of how a 14-year-old farm boy invented television and went to court to prove it, as well as how the Liberty Bell came to develop its crack.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E10 | Turkey Tracks
programme.desc: We explore a Connecticut town that claims to have dinosaur tracks, a museum of smugglers and their methods of smuggling, and the story of an artist who uses all types of wood to make his dream home.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E11 | The Brookdale Inn
programme.desc: We explore the stories of a small town named after a sports star who had never been to it, and a British couple who strive to recreate the 1940s in their home life.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E12 | The Underground Orchard
programme.desc: We explore the stories of a man who built an underground home and farm, a group of stone animals carved by an unknown artist, and the story of a flood of biblical proportions.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E13 | American Stonehenge
programme.desc: We explore the stories of an American version of Stonehenge, a Scrooge-like figure who shortchanged his servants out of their pay, as well as the collapse of a dam powering Los Angeles.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E1 | Mummy in a Catalogue
programme.desc: We explore the stories of a mummy's sarcophagus being sold in a holiday catalogue, Ben Franklin's glass harmonica, and a drunk elephant's rampage through Maine.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E2 | America's First Alien Abduction
programme.desc: We explore the stories of a man who paints a mountain in California, America's first alien abduction, as well as the stories about Gettysburg that your teachers left out.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E3 | The Handprint in the Jail Cell
programme.desc: We explore the stories of a war between mobsters over artichokes, as well as the story of an innocent man facing execution who leaves behind a handprint on his cell's wall that won't go away.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E4 | Aliens in New England
programme.desc: We explore the stories of a British priest who dressed as a mermaid, a father and son who created over 3,000 glass flowers, and a small town in New England that was besieged by UFOs.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E5 | Oddities in Pennsylvania
programme.desc: We explore the stories of a museum of medical oddities, three friends whose fates are all tied to the Battle of Gettysburg, as well as the town of Punxsutawney and their celebrated groundhog.

programme.desc: A high school student experiences hallucinations as she starts to witness the collapse of space and time.

programme.title: No One Heard The Scream
programme.desc: A high-class escort witnesses her new neighbor trying to dispose of his wife's corpse.

programme.title: Siege
programme.desc: When vigilantes massacre patrons of a gay bar, the sole survivor seeks refuge in a nearby apartment building.

programme.title: Street
programme.desc: A young fighter has to choose between honor and glory, or becoming a cage fighter for the Russian Mafia.

programme.title: Secret Reunion
programme.desc: Ji-won is one of numerous North Korean undercover spies living in South Korea as ordinary citizens, until he's called to fulfill his mission: the assassination of Kim Jong-il's second cousin! A rollicking action thriller, this Korean blockbuster pits North Korean spy vs. South Korean spy catcher in a riveting game of cat-and-mouse.

programme.title: Message from Space: Galactic Wars - The Miracle of the God Magnol
programme.desc: An old friend of Balu's plans to sell his island's religious artifacts to the Gavanas.

programme.title: The Huntresses
programme.desc: Enlisted by king himself, three bounty hunters are on a secret mission to foil a plot to overthrow the royal family.

programme.title: Shark Lake
programme.desc: Action legend Dolph Lundgren goes head-to-head with a blood thirsty shark that has a resort town under siege. As bodies wash up on the lake's shore an ex-con (Lundgren) must take matters in to his own hands to protect his daughter.

programme.title: Wild Bill Hickok: Swift Justice
programme.desc: Wild Bill Hickok faces many challenges on his quest to redeem himself from a colorful past as an outlaw and gunslinger.

programme.title: Penelope
programme.desc: Born with a snout, Penelope must find true love in order to break the curse. Her controlling parents line up potential husbands, but Penelope just wants to see the world, and ultimately it is her first real adventure that leads her to romance.

programme.title: My Week with Marilyn
programme.desc: An assistant on the set of THE PRINCE AND THE SHOWGIRL documents the week he spent befriending Marilyn Monroe (Williams) and helping her escape the pressures of fame and Hollywood.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers (2011)
programme.desc: The young hero D'Artagnan (Logan Lerman) and three of France's most elite warriors battle their way across Europe to save king and country from a conspiracy led by deadly assassin Milady (Milla Jovovich) & the Duke of Buckingham (Orlando Bloom). A modern update to Alexander Dumas' classic story, The Three Musketeers is an explosive action adventure Ignatiy Vishnevetsky of Ebert Presents: At The Movies calls, "over-the-top entertainment."

programme.title: Stone
programme.desc: Academy-Award®-winner Robert De Niro and Academy-Award®-nominee Edward Norton deliver powerful performances as a seasoned corrections official and a scheming inmate whose lives become dangerously intertwined in this thought-provoking drama.

programme.title: Operation Petticoat
programme.desc: A submarine captain and his supply officer are determined to get their dry-dock sub back into WWII action. However, a bevy of nurses comes aboard, causing hijinks in the hot pink sub.

programme.title: Hatari!
programme.desc: Director Howard Hawks reteams with John Wayne, who heads a group of highly skilled professional game hunters in Africa. Only they don’t use bullets – they capture the ferocious big game with strong rope and cameras for zoos and circus attractions.

programme.title: Houseboat
programme.desc: This Oscar®-nominated film has the legendary Cary Grant as a government attorney who can't seem to shake his bad fortune. Living on a houseboat, widowed and left with three unruly kids, he hires Sophia Loren as a governess.

programme.title: Hud
programme.desc: Hud Bannon (Paul Newman) is the rebellious son of a respectable rancher who’s continually at odds with his aging father. Patricia Neal and Melvyn Douglas co-star, in their Oscar®-winning roles.

programme.title: The Boys Next Door
programme.desc: Four mentally handicapped adult men and their burned out social worker who must break the news that he is leaving.

programme.title: Blind Spot
programme.desc: A woman running for the Senate is jolted by a family tragedy which threatens to become a career ending scandal. Stars Joanne Woodward and Laura Linney. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Remember Sunday
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck waitress meets jewelry store clerk, Gus, but complications ensue because of his memory problems. A brain aneurysm three years earlier gives Gus a blank slate the second his alarm wakes him each day.

programme.title: Mr. Hockey: The Gordie Howe Story
programme.desc: The story of Gordie Howe's famed return to hockey at age 45, playing professionally alongside his 18- and 19-year-old sons, a comeback that brought his family together and remains one of the most legendary in hockey history.

programme.title: A Painted House
programme.desc: 10-year-old Luke had never kept a secret or told a lie. But when two groups of migrant workers-and two dangerous men-come to work the family's Arkansas cotton farm, mysteries suddenly flood Luke's world.

programme.title: Much Ado About Nothing
programme.desc: A modern retelling of Shakespeare's classic comedy about two pairs of lovers with different takes on romance.

programme.title: Elvis Has Left The Building
programme.desc: Harmony Jones is a cosmetic sales woman whose life is shaped by an early encounter with the King himself.

programme.title: According to Greta
programme.desc: A suicidal and rebellious teen is sent to her grandparents for the summer where life takes an unexpected turn.

programme.title: Much Ado About Nothing
programme.desc: A modern retelling of Shakespeare's classic comedy about two pairs of lovers with different takes on romance.

programme.title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
programme.desc: Tells the intriguing and highly seductive story behind one of Vermeer’s greatest and most enigmatic paintings.

programme.title: The Proud Rebel
programme.desc: Confederate veteran John Chandler (Alan Ladd) returns from defeat in war to find his home razed, his wife dead and his young son, David (David Ladd), traumatized and rendered mute. Desperate to cure the boy, Chandler takes David to a small town in Illinois where he hopes to find a doctor. But, soon after the pair arrives, Chandler finds himself framed for assault -- and forced to choose between serving hard time and working for struggling local farmer Linnett Moore (Olivia de Havilland).

programme.title: Adventures in Public School
programme.desc: A socially awkward, home-schooled kid forces his way into public school against his suffocating but loving mother's wishes. Co-starring Judy Greer.

programme.title: The Good Catholic
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, small-town priest Daniel is torn between his commitment to his job and his newfound love, Jane. With Danny Glover.

programme.title: Upside Down
programme.desc: Adam and Eden fell in love as teens despite the fact that they live on twinned worlds with gravities that pull in opposite directions. Adam sets out on a dangerous quest to reconnect with his love.

programme.title: Out of Liberty
programme.desc: In the winter of 1839, a jailer has to watch over the most dangerous men in the state while they await trial.

programme.title: Project Almanac
programme.desc: When five teens discover a machine that can send them back in time, the possibilities seem endless. But by changing the past, they have threatened the future of our world. Can they undo the damage they have unleashed before it’s too late?

programme.title: Labyrinth
programme.desc: A girl (Jennifer Connelly) must solve a dangerous labyrinth and rescue her brother when her wish for him to be taken away is granted by the Goblin King (David Bowie).

programme.title: The Darkest Hour
programme.desc: In this tense apocalyptic thriller, five youths fight to survive after being stranded in Moscow during an alien attack.

programme.title: Project Almanac
programme.desc: When five teens discover a machine that can send them back in time, the possibilities seem endless. But by changing the past, they have threatened the future of our world. Can they undo the damage they have unleashed before it’s too late?

programme.title: Beowulf
programme.desc: After Beowulf, the mightiest warrior of all destroys the overpowering demon Grendel, he incurs the wrath of the beast's mother to seek out revenge.

programme.title: The Assassin's Code
programme.desc: A rookie detective, son of a late disgraced cop, works to solve his first major case while under the watchful eye of a ghost-like assassin.

programme.title: Shooting Gallery
programme.desc: A street-wise man (Freddie Prinze Jr.) gets mixed up in a scheme involving a pool shark (Ving Rhames) and a crooked lawman.

programme.title: Sacrifice
programme.desc: A undercover cop inadvertently gets involved in a heroin ring when a young defector of the drug trade leaves his 5-year-old sister in his care. Starring Cuba Gooding Jr. and Christian Slater.

programme.title: The Defender
programme.desc: In this political action thriller, Lance and his team are named bodyguards for an NSA agent who is sent by the president to attend a secret meeting in Bucharest.

programme.title: No Way Back
programme.desc: A rogue FBI agent (Oscar winner Russell Crowe) recruits a Yakuza boss and a ditzy flight attendant to help him rescue his kidnapped son from the clutches of a revenge-crazed mobster.

programme.title: The Untold History Of The United States: Bush & Clinton: Squandered Peace - New World Order
programme.desc: Russia introduced to American Capitalism. U.S. goes to war in Middle East. New World Order shaped.

programme.title: The Untold History Of The United States: Johnson, Nixon & Vietnam: Reversal of Fortune
programme.desc: Cataclysm in Vietnam as the war reaches a turning point - there's no going back. The betrayal by Richard Nixon.

programme.title: Festival Express
programme.desc: In the summer of 1970, some of the era's biggest rock stars took to the rails for Festival Express, a multi-artist, multi-city concert tour that captured the spirit and imagination of a generation. For five days, musicians like Janis Joplin, The Grateful Dead, and The Band lived, slept, rehearsed and let loose aboard a customized train with the entire experience being filmed on and off stage.

programme.title: Inside Lehman Brothers
programme.desc: Messy mortgages taken out by Lehman Brothers caused a global financial crisis. Ten years later, the French journalist Jennifer Deschamps examines the moral failures of the institution and the insiders and whistleblowers who attempted to make their voices heard.

programme.title: Penguins Under Siege
programme.desc: "Penguins Under Siege" is the story of Lucy and Louie, two vulnerable penguin chicks born on the harsh Skeleton Coast of Southwestern Africa.

programme.title: Armstrong
programme.desc: Interviews and never-before-seen footage highlight the incredible life of astronaut Neil Armstrong -- from his near-death experiences as a fighter pilot and test pilot to his historic Apollo 11 mission as the first man on the moon.

programme.title: Bluest Moon
programme.desc: Friends must lean on one another for relationship advice in order to find peace within their individual relationships with men. Sheila needs a lot more than friendly advice when it comes to her relationships. She needs professional help. Will she realize this before it's too late?'

programme.title: The Foreign Exchange Student
programme.desc: Sinclair John is a beautiful, troubled, young high school senior from Dominica. When her parents suspect she may have had something to do with her boyfriend's death, they ship her to America under the Foreign Exchange Student Program. While living with her new family, she wreaks havoc and it's up to Jackie to stop her.

programme.title: Before I Do
programme.desc: A game of Russian roulette. There are scandalous secrets and a cover up, and three people, bound to take them to the grave. Before 'I Do' draws you into the realm of passion and love, lust, lies, and friendship. A fast-paced, colorful, action drama with a splash of comedy and a myriad of surprises.

programme.title: The Lying Truth
programme.desc: A rapper is accused of assault by a beautiful video vixen. He says it was consensual. One of them will be exposed as a liar when the truth is revealed.

programme.title: A Very Merry New Year
programme.desc: Secrets and old ties are exposed when Mary gathers her high school friends together to celebrate the New Year.

programme.title: Dinotopia, Ep. 3
programme.desc: Erik von Detten, Shiloh Strong, Michael Brandon, Georgina Rylance, Sophie Ward, Lisa Zane, Jonathan Hyde Castaways in time find themselves stranded on the shores of a prehistoric Eden where dinosaurs and humans co-exist in peace and harmony

programme.title: Jules Verne's Mysterious Island, Ep. 1
programme.desc: Kyle MacLachlan, Patrick Stewart, Gabrielle Anwar, Omar Gooding, Jason Durr, Danielle Calvert, Roy Marsden Escaping from a Confederate prison camp by balloon, five survivors land on an uncharted island in the Pacific. Far from a sanctuary, the island is home to carnivorous monsters, bloodthirsty pirates, and the mad genius, Captain Nemo, who inhabits the mysterious island for his own strange ends.

programme.title: Jules Verne's Mysterious Island, Ep. 2
programme.desc: Kyle MacLachlan, Patrick Stewart, Gabrielle Anwar, Omar Gooding, Jason Durr, Danielle Calvert, Roy Marsden Escaping from a Confederate prison camp by balloon, five survivors land on an uncharted island in the Pacific. Far from a sanctuary, the island is home to carnivorous monsters, bloodthirsty pirates, and the mad genius, Captain Nemo, who inhabits the mysterious island for his own strange ends.

programme.title: Riot
programme.desc: Mario Van Peebles, Luke Perry, Lucy Liu, Dante Basco, Kieu Chinh, Alexis Cruz, Yelba Osorio, John Oritz, Douglas Spain Four real-life stories set against the backdrop of the 1992 Los Angeles riots intertwine to explore the shattering drama that changed the lives of everyone who experienced it.

programme.title: Pandemic, Ep. 1
programme.desc: Tiffani Thiessen, French Stewart, Faye Dunaway, Eric Roberts, Vincent Spano, Bob Gunton, Michael Massee When inexplicable flu-like symptoms kill a young man aboard an airliner en route to Los Angeles from Australia, Dr. Kayla Martin, head of the Center for Disease Control, orders the quarantine of all the passengers. But the deadly strain of this unknown virus is already spreading, and so is the panic. And now it’s a race against the clock, and across the globe, to find a cure.

programme.title: Yogawoman
programme.desc: A generation of women are leading the way and radically changing lives. Yogawoman unveils the global phenomenon that has changed the face of yoga forever.

programme.title: The Body Fights Back
programme.desc: The Body Fights Back is a feature documentary about five people navigating the paradoxes of diet culture. While promises of happiness, desirability and perfection are irresistible, joy and contentment remain out of reach.

programme.title: 1 Mountain
programme.desc: Hunter Wood is one of the best skiers in the world. Struggling for direction in his life he decides to test his limits on the most treacherous mountains in North America.

programme.title: Diet Fiction
programme.desc: This film exposes the most popular diets on the planet as well as several misconceptions about weight loss and nutrition. The film follows the audacious filmmaker Michal Siewierski (Food Choices) in his treacherous journey.

programme.title: Ogar: Will of Steel
programme.desc: Kevin ogar, an athlete destined for greatness, suddenly finds himself paralyzed, his dreams shattered.

programme.title: The Food Cure
programme.desc: Six advanced cancer patients make an unusual choice. They decide to face the disease with their forks. The patients embark on an arduous 7-year journey as they attempt to eat and juice their way back to health...with surprising results.

programme.title: The Wrong Box
programme.desc: In Victorian England, a fortune now depends on which of two brothers outlives the other... or can be made to have seemed to do so!

programme.title: The Talk Of The Town
programme.desc: A conservative Supreme Court candidate is persuaded to help a left-leaning fugitive who's been framed for a deadly arson fire.

programme.title: Pal Joey

programme.title: Under The Yum Yum Tree

programme.title: Immediate Family
programme.desc: A married, childless couple decide to adopt from a pregnant teenage girl, who later gets second thoughts.

programme.title: The Shadow Riders

programme.title: Eat A Bowl Of Tea
programme.desc: A Chinese-American and his wife face a clash of cultures in post-WWII New York's Chinatown.

programme.title: Gloria

programme.title: Up The Macgregors

programme.title: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: Trappers working as scouts at a remote army fort witness the unprepared garrison attack a sizable Sioux force.

programme.title: The Outlaw Stallion
programme.desc: A widowed mother and her son live a quiet life on their ranch until the boy's white stallion kills a gang leader's black stallion. Roberts, the evil outlaw, is determined to avenge his stallion's death and kidnaps the kid, his mother, and the horse. As with the horse battle, however, the white hats put an end to the menacing ways of the black hats.

programme.title: Jack McCall, Desperado
programme.desc: A Southerner fighting for the North is unjustly accused of treason and escapes to clear his name.

programme.title: The Misfits

programme.title: The Cowboy and the Lady
programme.desc: A lonely socialite masquerades as a maid and meets an unpretentious, plain-spoken cowboy who is unaware of her true identity.

programme.title: The Proposition
programme.desc: In this gritty Western written by acclaimed songwriter Nick Cave, a lawman (Guy Pearce) apprehends a notorious outlaw and gives him nine days to kill his older brother.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A dead man's ghost begins terrorizing his heirs who were required by will to live on the descendant's ranch. Our heroes play ghost busters to get to the bottom of things.

programme.desc: Sharpshooter Marty Blair tries to persuade Lucas to buy Mark a rifle. After Lucas shoots a man during a robbery at the hotel, Mark and Lucas disagree his character.

programme.title: Black Fox

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.desc: A murder occurs at a railroad camp and a young Indian friend of Lucas' is accused of the killing. When Lucas tries to help the boy, he finds himself on trial.
